koohiiStory1: If you grind the hemp you are bound to get stoned quicker.
koohiiStory2: You must GRIND the HEMP collected in the grove by your cave on solid STONE to make the best ropes.
myStory: nghiền, xay, xát. cây đay cho vào đá mài
